casebody.data:
STATE of North Carolina
v.
Johnnie L. HARRINGTON. No. 441P92-7. Supreme Court of North Carolina. Jan. 28, 2016. Johnnie L. Flarrington, for Flarrington, Johnnie L. Derrick Mertz, Special Deputy Attorney General, for State of N.C. Vernon K. Stewart, District Attorney, for State of N.C.

ORDER

Upon consideration of the petition filed by Defendant on the 30th of November 2015 in this matter for a writ of certiorari to review the order of the Superior Court, Lee County, the following order was entered and is hereby certified to the Superior Court of that County:

"Dismissed by order of the Court in conference, this the 28th of January 2016."
ERVIN, J. recused.
